title: I Love GP's New Joke
body:
_"I have a deficiency... In cares" _

That pretty much equates too "I give zero fucks"

And not a fuck was given that day

replies.body:
"They're not just oranges...they're blood oranges!"

This made my day when i first heard it.
I LOVE spamming his new animations. Hilarious.

The ctrl 1 pelvic thrust spam is great
The ctrl 4 floating flame sword is nice too
T'was the first thing I did when I got into a game with him, had me in stitches! :D :D
The Roger is no longer jolly now ._.

Honestly, while his Actual Voice might reflect that, his animations are the opposite.

Most jolly animations to date I'd say. 

http://plays.tv/video/55b61d005f274beacb

spam /joke when facing away from camera
enjoy the pirate's booty ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Rivaling Frostblade Irelia for best booty NA.

> [{quoted}](name=Solis Umbra,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8jHiuINd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-27T10:18:37.372+0000)
>
> The Roger is no longer jolly now ._.

it will always be :^)
He's Roger is so jolly, because he's gonna board MF's... ship. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
yea gotta miss that but still a good rework

Well it makes sense, Gangplank's all about sticking to targets and brushing off Morgana Qs like they're mosquito bites.

{{champion:41}} Oh, Ashe just hit me with Enchanted Crystal Arrow across the map?  Lol like I give a fuck.


*Proceeds to eat oranges and be k.
I never got to know why his roger was so jolly :(
i'm over here trying to figure out what's making his roger so jolly
I just love spamming his taunt over a dead enemy body.
didnt take a genius to figure that one out. not like it was some hidden secret they just dont want to change the rating of their game for one shitty joke
0h dam u da smartst man I eva seen

He also has a deficiency in life.


Too soon?
